title: [Large-scale] Simulation-Based Generalized Nursing Curriculum Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Nursing Skills and Clinical Practice Experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening the integration of practice and theory, providing learner-tailored support services

learning_goals: Learners perform patient status assessments and basic nursing intervention skills via VR simulations with over 80% accuracy.
Learners analyze the integration of theory and practice and propose at least three application strategies for clinical cases.
Learners draft practical scenario improvements based on peer feedback and engage in discussions with over 90% participation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
